title: Vaccination Card
description: Secure storage of vaccine details and vaccination records.
Real-time updates of each patient's vaccination status on a decentralized ledger.
Mobile application developed in Flutter and Dart for easy access to vaccination history and schedules.
Node.js and Express server layer for efficient communication between the mobile app and the blockchain.

title: Glucos
description: Smartphone application developed using Flutter and Dart.
Insulin dosage calculator, enabling diabetic users to input their current blood sugar levels and carbohydrate intake.
The app calculates the necessary insulin dosage based on user inputs to assist in diabetes management.
A diary feature to save and review past calculations and insulin dosages.
Options to switch between different units for measuring carbohydrates and blood sugar.

title: LexiLens
description: Browser extension targeted at English speakers who are learning German.
Developed using the Plasmo framework and React with TypeScript.
Operates on Google Firebase, handling backend functionalities such as data storage and processing.
Highlights every word on a webpage in one of three colors: red for unknown vocabulary, yellow for vocabulary previously encountered, and green for vocabulary the user already knows.
Helps users easily identify and learn new German words and their usage in context.
Integrates Google Cloud NLP for syntactic analysis, Microsoft Azure Translate for translations, and a Dictionary API for definitions.
